description.value: Amidst the dust and dreams of Rubi-Ka's frontier, you built a life from nothing, a Colonist carving out hope in a land torn by corporate greed and clan rebellion. Your days were spent taming the wilds and defending your claim. Yet, a restlessness stirs within you, a longing to explore beyond the horizon, to unravel the planetâ€™s hidden histories and your own destiny within them.

ideals.description: "I thrived on carving out a new life in uncharted territories."
"I believed in the strength of unity and cooperation."
"I expressed my heritage, background, or beliefs through my actions."

life_path.name: Displaced Survivor
life_path.description: Your home was razed in a raid. Uprooted and scarred, you learned to survive and adapt in unfamiliar lands, picking up a variety of skills.

life_path.name: Pioneering Spirit
life_path.description: Part of the first settlers on a new territory, you helped build a community from the ground up, learning the essentials of construction, agriculture, and diplomacy.

life_path.name: Lost Family Legacy
life_path.description: The fall of your family's business propelled you into a nomadic life. Seeking to reclaim your legacy, you've honed diverse skills to survive the corporate world.

life_path.name: Cultural Outcast
life_path.description: Exiled over cultural misunderstandings, you've traversed various lands, learning to adapt, cook with limited resources, and repair what you can to survive.

life_path.name: Heroic Rescuer
life_path.description: You emerged as a hero when disaster struck your colony, but the incident left its mark. Driven by your experiences, you've developed a broad skill set to protect others.
